concept.title: Coexistence of CEX7C and previous features

titlealts.searchtitle: (): Coexistence of CEX7C and previous features

concept.shortdesc: While CEX7C is only supported on processors starting with , and CEX6S and CEX5S coprocessors are supported on processors starting with , the 7.1 RPM is also useful on and other legacy systems. The 7.1 RPM specifically adds support for the new 5.6 firmware on and 6.4 firmware on . This information unit discusses co-existence considerations for the 7.1 RPM.

ul.li: Use 7.1 to update existing 6.* installations or to install it to a fresh client. Running 7.1 in parallel with a prior 6.* RPM is not supported.

The latest RPM supersedes and replaces earlier RPMs if installed in the default manner. It is not recommended to manually alter the installation in order to run newer versions of RPMs in parallel with older versions. This configuration is not supported.
